title: Bass Ale logo
content:
Can anybody help me identify the font used at www.bassale.com?   
   
It is the logo for Bass Ale.   
   
Thank you for any help.
author: anonymous

comments.content:
No, I don't know, but you could check out Radio by that Norwegian guy, Magnus Rakeng. Pretty close.   
 [http://www.thirstype.com/font\_radio.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110131182139/http:/www.thirstype.com/font_radio.html)
